title: Mobile Experimental Learning Course for Design Thinking Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Design Principles and Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A program developing design problem-solving competencies through experimental activities in a smartphone-based limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners will complete five or more experimental projects that solve complex social problems using design thinking methodology.
Learners will experience the process of creating prototypes using mobile tools and incorporating user feedback at least three times.
Learners will analyze design innovation cases and derive two or more creative approaches applicable to future work environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
